summary: Writing/reading app for serialized stories: writers publish short stories or chapter-by-chapter novels with profiles; readers get 1 daily credit (rollover) and can buy weekly/monthly memberships for more access; includes likes/comments, social sharing, and revenue split with writers. Authentication will use Internet Identity (not email).
architectural_notes: Authentication must use Internet Identity (no email/password login).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist logo mark combining a quill pen and an open book, flat vector style, warm neutral palette (logo-quill-book.dim_512x512.png)
- Soft hero/background illustration of a desk with paper, ink, and books, low-contrast, cozy editorial style (auth-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)
- Default circular avatar illustration (simple silhouette), neutral colors (default-avatar.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Replace all email/password authentication flows with Internet Identity login/logout, using the existing Internet Identity integration hooks/components provided by the template (without editing any immutable hook files).

Implement a post-login onboarding/profile flow that allows a signed-in user to create/update their writer/reader profile fields (display name, bio, and profile picture), stored and fetched by Principal.

Apply a coherent, creative visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for a writing/reading platform, and ensure consistency across the authentication and profile screens.

Add generated static image assets (logo + subtle background/hero illustration) and render them in the app shell and/or sign-in/onboarding screens via frontend static assets (do not serve images from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Use Internet Identity for user authentication instead of email/password
Writer onboarding and profile (profile picture, bio) and ability to publish short stories or novels chapter-by-chapter
Reader credit system: 1 credit/day, credits roll over, redeem 1 credit to read one short story or one chapter
Paid access options: weekly membership ($1.99) and monthly membership ($4.99) to read more than daily credits allow
Engagement features: readers can like and comment on stories; writers can reply to comments
Social sharing of stories/chapters to platforms like X and Facebook
Membership revenue split: writers receive 50% of membership revenue; writers may also publish on other platforms
Update backend identity handling so user accounts are keyed by the caller Principal (Internet Identity), and ensure all authenticated operations use the caller identity rather than an email address.

projectName: Switch authentication to Internet Identity (remove email/password login)
